title: Bitwise AND of Numbers Range
description:
Bitwise AND of Numbers Range

Leetcode 201. Bitwise AND of Numbers Range

You are given two integers `left` and `right` that represent the range `[left, right]`, return the **bitwise AND** of all numbers in this range, inclusive.

Examples:

  • Input: left = 1, right = 5

    Output: 0
  • Input: left = 10, right = 12

    Output: 8

Constraints:

  • `0 <= left <= right <= ((2^31)-1)`

This implements a robust solution that handles the problem requirements efficiently.
The approach analyzes input patterns and provides appropriate processing.

**Space Complexity:** O(1) to O(n) - optimized for space when possible
